languages.text: "Что вы такое говорите!" {n}Обычно сдержанная Кассия бросает на вас гневный взгляд.{/n} "Неужели Вольный Торговец столь низкого мнения о крови Навис Нобилите? Если бы скверна Имматериума могла так просто сломить нашу волю и искалечить душу, Император никогда бы не доверил нам нашу долю!"

traits.locale_text: "Что вы такое говорите!" {n}Обычно сдержанная Кассия бросает на вас гневный взгляд. Словно зеркало, вы копируете ее гнев.{/n} "Неужели Вольный Торговец столь низкого мнения о крови Навис Нобилите? Если бы скверна Имматериума могла так просто сломить нашу волю и искалечить душу, Император никогда бы не доверил нам нашу долю!"

languages.text: "What are you saying?" {n}The usually reserved Cassia glares at you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader have so low an opinion of Navis Nobilite blood? If the corruption of the Immaterium could so easily break our will and maim our soul, the Emperor would never have entrusted us with our sacred duty!"
languages.original_text: "Что вы такое говорите!" {n}Обычно сдержанная Кассия бросает на вас гневный взгляд.{/n} "Неужели Вольный Торговец столь низкого мнения о крови Навис Нобилите? Если бы скверна Имматериума могла так просто сломить нашу волю и искалечить душу, Император никогда бы не доверил нам нашу долю!"

traits.locale_text: "What are you saying?" {n}The usually reserved Cassia glares at you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader have so low an opinion of Navis Nobilite blood? If the corruption of the Immaterium could so easily break our will and maim our soul, the Emperor would never have entrusted us with our sacred duty?"

"What are you saying?" {n}The usually reserved Cassia glares at you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader have so low an opinion of Navis Nobilite blood? If the corruption of the Immaterium could so easily break our will and maim our soul, the Emperor would never have entrusted us with our sacred duty?"

"What are you saying?" {n}The usually reserved Cassia glares at you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader have so low an opinion of Navis Nobilite blood? If the corruption of the Immaterium could so easily break our will and maim our soul, the Emperor would never have entrusted us with our sacred duty?"

"What are you saying?" {n}The usually reserved Cassia glares at you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader have so low an opinion of Navis Nobilite blood? If the corruption of the Immaterium could so easily break our will and maim our soul, the Emperor would never have entrusted us with our sacred duty!"

languages.text: 「一体何を言いだすのですか？」{n}普段は控えめなカシアがこちらを睨んだ。{/n}「自由開拓者は航宙貴族の血をそれほどまでに見下しておいでで？非物質世界の腐敗が我々の意志を簡単に断ち切り魂を傷つけるのであれば、皇帝は我々に神聖な義務を託すことはなかったはずでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "What are you saying?" {n}The usually reserved Cassia glares at you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader have so low an opinion of Navis Nobilite blood? If the corruption of the Immaterium could so easily break our will and maim our soul, the Emperor would never have entrusted us with our sacred duty!"

traits.locale_text: 「一体何を言いだすのですか？」{n}普段は控えめなカシアがこちらを睨んだ。{/n}「自由開拓者は航宙貴族の血をそれほどまでに見下しているのですか？非物質世界の腐敗が我々の意志を簡単に断ち切り魂を傷つけるのであれば、皇帝は我々に神聖な義務を託すことはなかったはずでしょう？」

languages.text: “你在说什么呢？”{n}一向矜持的卡西娅此刻瞪着你。{/n}“难道行商浪人对于导航宗族的评价就这么低吗？如果亚空间的腐化会如此简单地摧垮我们的意志，扭曲我们的灵魂，那帝皇又怎么会将如此神圣的职责托付给我们！”
languages.original_text: "What are you saying?" {n}The usually reserved Cassia glares at you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader have so low an opinion of Navis Nobilite blood? If the corruption of the Immaterium could so easily break our will and maim our soul, the Emperor would never have entrusted us with our sacred duty!"

traits.locale_text: “你在说什么呢？”{n}一向矜持的卡西娅此刻瞪着你。{/n}“难道行商浪人对于导航宗族的评价就这么低吗？如果亚空间的腐化会如此简单地摧垮我们的意志，扭曲我们的灵魂，那帝皇又怎么会将如此神圣的职责托付给我们？”

languages.text: «¿Qué insinúa?». {n}Cassia, normalmente reservada, te lanza una mirada asesina.{/n} «¿Tan mala impresión tiene de la sangre de la Navis Nobilite, Comerciante Independiente? Si la corrupción del Inmaterio pudiera doblegar nuestra voluntad y mutilar nuestra alma con tal facilidad, ¿cree que el Emperador nos hubiera encomendado este sagrado deber?».
languages.original_text: "What are you saying?" {n}The usually reserved Cassia glares at you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader have so low an opinion of Navis Nobilite blood? If the corruption of the Immaterium could so easily break our will and maim our soul, the Emperor would never have entrusted us with our sacred duty!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué insinúa?». {n}Cassia, normalmente reservada, te lanza una mirada asesina.{/n} «¿Tan mala impresión tiene de la sangre de la Navis Nobilite, Comerciante Independiente? Si la corrupción del Inmaterio pudiera doblegar nuestra voluntad y mutilar nuestra alma con tal facilidad, ¿cree que el Emperador nos hubiera encomendado este sagrado deber?».

languages.text: « Qu'entendez-vous par là ? » {n}Cassia oublie un instant sa timidité pour vous lancer un regard noir.{/n} « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} mépriserait-{mf|il|elle} le sang de la Navis Nobilite à ce point ? Si la corruption de l'Immaterium pouvait briser notre volonté et mutiler notre âme aussi facilement, l'Empereur ne nous aurait jamais confié le devoir sacré qui est le nôtre. »
languages.original_text: "What are you saying?" {n}The usually reserved Cassia glares at you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader have so low an opinion of Navis Nobilite blood? If the corruption of the Immaterium could so easily break our will and maim our soul, the Emperor would never have entrusted us with our sacred duty!"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'entendez-vous par là ? » {n}Cassia oublie un instant sa timidité pour vous lancer un regard noir.{/n} « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} mépriserait-{mf|il|elle} le sang de la Navis Nobilite à ce point ? Si la corruption de l'Immaterium pouvait briser notre volonté et mutiler notre âme aussi facilement, l'Empereur ne nous aurait jamais confié le devoir sacré qui est le nôtre. »

languages.text: "Was sagt Ihr da?" {n}Die sonst so reservierte Cassia funkelt dich an.{/n} "Hat {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} eine so geringe Meinung vom Blut der Navis Nobilite? Wenn die Verderbnis des Immateriums unseren Willen so leicht brechen, unsere Seele so leicht zerreißen kann, hätte der Imperator uns dann unsere heilige Pflicht anvertraut?"
languages.original_text: "What are you saying?" {n}The usually reserved Cassia glares at you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader have so low an opinion of Navis Nobilite blood? If the corruption of the Immaterium could so easily break our will and maim our soul, the Emperor would never have entrusted us with our sacred duty!"

traits.locale_text: "Was sagt Ihr da?" {n}Die sonst so reservierte Cassia funkelt dich an.{/n} "Hat {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} eine so geringe Meinung vom Blut der Navis Nobilite? Wenn die Verderbnis des Immateriums unseren Willen so leicht brechen, unsere Seele so leicht zerreißen kann, hätte der Imperator uns dann unsere heilige Pflicht anvertraut?"

languages.text: "Neler söylüyorsunuz?" {n}Normalde serin kanlı olan Cassia, sana bakıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, Navis Nobilite kanını bu kadar mı küçük görüyor? Tindiyar'ın yozlaşması bizim irademizi bu kadar kolay kırabilse, ruhumuzu bu kadar kolay yaralayabilseydi İmparator, bu kutsal görevi bize asla bahşetmezdi!"
languages.original_text: "What are you saying?" {n}The usually reserved Cassia glares at you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader have so low an opinion of Navis Nobilite blood? If the corruption of the Immaterium could so easily break our will and maim our soul, the Emperor would never have entrusted us with our sacred duty!"

traits.locale_text: "Neler söylüyorsunuz?" {n}Normalde serin kanlı olan Cassia sana bakıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, Navis Nobilite kanını bu kadar mı küçük görüyor? Tindiyar'ın yozlaşması bizim irademizi bu kadar kolay kırabilseydi, ruhumuzu bu kadar kolay yaralayabilseydi, İmparator bu kutsal görevi bize asla bahşetmezdi!"
